dict.acceptation: 椅子；大学教授职位；主持会议的主席（的席位或职位）；讲座；
主持；使…入座；使就任要职；

sent.orig: Our product: stack chair beam chair, dining chair, student chair, table and so on.
sent.trans: 主要产品有餐椅，餐台，休闲椅，办公椅，学生椅等。

sent.orig: Xinbang Hardware Plastic Factory specialize in producing bar chair, bar, chair, beach chair and so on.
sent.trans: 鑫帮五金塑料厂主要生产酒吧椅，酒吧台，餐椅，沙滩椅等。

sent.orig: Turn sideways to the chair back and place your left hand on the chair back.
sent.trans: 将身体侧向椅背并把左手放在椅子上。

sent.orig: Our main products: beach chair (chair) beach bed folding tables and chairs tents portable travel supplies.
sent.trans: 永康市唐先特普户外用品厂主要产品与：沙滩椅（休闲椅），沙滩床，折叠桌椅，帐篷，便携式旅行用品等。

sent.orig: The leg of the chair broke and the chair canted over.
sent.trans: 一只凳脚折断，椅子翻倒了。
